scripts.install:all: pnpm -C frontend install && pnpm -C backend install || true
scripts.dev: concurrently -k -n backend,frontend -c blue,green "BACKEND_PORT=8081 pnpm -C backend dev" "BACKEND_ORIGIN=http://localhost:8081 pnpm -C frontend dev"
scripts.build: pnpm -C backend build && pnpm -C frontend build
